body.name: Selfie Stick Tripod, All in One Extendable & Portable Selfie Stick with Wireless Remote Compatible with iPhone 14 13 12 11 pro Xs Max Xr X 8 7, Galaxy Note10/S20/S10/OnePlus 9/9 PRO etc
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 12 hrs 17 mins
features: 【Extendable & Foldable Selfie Stick】The SelfieShow Selfie Stick thanks to the hidden retractable design, It is extremely compact when folded up, only 7.6 inches (19.4CM) 155g, very light to carry, Fits perfectly in a handbag ready to use whenever. But also can extend a long way: 40.6inches (103CM), and let you capture selfies with a larger field of view, great for Selfies, Group Photos, Face-time, Life-Vlog, Video shooting, Social life, etc.

【Multi-purpose Selfie Stick Tripod】This is a nifty piece of kit, not only a selfie stick but can also be converted very easily into a phone stand, At the bottom end, you can release the three legs to get a tabletop tripod. In normal conditions on a flat surface, The shorter it is extended, the more stable it will be. A nice steady balanced tripod for convenience of hands free selfies and Facetime/video calling.

【Adjustable Angle & Rotatable Phone Holder】360° rotatable phone holder and 235° rotation head allow you to find your best photo angle freely by simply rotating the angle. The camera angle is wider and the composition is more diversified. Suitable for family gatherings and friends reunions, trips, hiking, travel, camping, sports activities such as snowboarding, skiing and surfing, snorkeling. No matter indoor or outdoor activities.

【Detachable Remote Control】Including a detachable remote shutter with 10m effective distance, the tripod for phone is great for travel, trip, vocation. Never have to rely on a self timer or ask strangers to take photos for you. Take the phone tripod to the beach and make it stand on the sand, capturing every amazing moment on the go.

【Widely Compatible】The phone holder fits most phones within 65-95mm. And the remote is widely compatible with iPhone and Android phones, such as iPhone 13 Mini/13/13 Pro/13 Pro Max/12 Pro Max/12 Pro/12/11/XS MAX/XR/XS/X/8/8 Plus series, Samsung Galaxy S21/Note 20 series, and most other smartphones.
body.description: LIGHT AND PORTABLE The folded length is just 7.6 inches with only 155g weight, so it can be easily and freely put into the bag while you don’t need its help. Mini size is super convenient to carry. Extendable length between 19.4 - 103 cm(7.6 - 40.6 in), use a short length for intimate shots,or make a longer length to get more wider scenery. Weight: 155g Folded Size: 7.63inches Extended Size: 40.55inches Wireless Distance: 10M System: Android 4.4+, iOS 5.1+ Materials: ABS, Stainless Steel

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 360°Rotable Design The Wireless selfie stick is super adjustable which provides a 250° vertical rotation angle of bracket and a 360° horizontal rotation angle of phone holder, so that you can choose the best angle when you take photos/ videos for the sweet moments. Removable Remote Control Wireless remote shutter (Support 10m remote control), liberate your hands. You can take down the remote control to take pictures/ videos, for a close self-photography or extend it to get a larger scenery. The farther the distance, the more scenery you can capture. Adjustable Phone Holder The adjustable phone holder expands up to 3.74 in, fits most smart phones with or without a case, compatible with iPhone 13/12/11/Max/XS/XR/X//8/7/6/Plus, Galaxy S9/S9 Plus/S8/S7 Edge/Note 8/Note 9, Huawei, Xiaomi & more Android Smartphones.

In the Box 1 x Selfie Stick 1 x Mini Wireless Remote 1 x User Manual 1 x CR1632 Battery(CAN CHANGE) LIGHT AND PORTABLE The folded length is just 7.6 inches with only 155g weight, so it can be easily and freely put into the bag while you don’t need its help. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I haven't used it but a few times, but seems to be a great product. I love the versatility of all the adjustments, and it folds up small. The remote is rather small, but it paired up quickly with my phone and works fine. One reviewer mentioned that the remote will not start and stop video, it does fine on my S21 Ultra. I also read complaints about short battery life of the remote. There is an on/off switch on the remote, always be sure to turn that off before putting it away. The tripod feature is a little wobbly, but not bad, I don't foresee any problem with the unit falling over by itself. The light is a really nice feature, it isn't extra bright, but does work well in closeups. At its price point, this product is hard to beat, six stars!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and a good value
reviews.reviewText: The stick it's self is sturdy and very compact to carry, it extends out to a long distance. The remote was easy to connect and we have connected it to multiple phones. I mainly got this to use as a small portable tripod and it is a little wobbly but usable for that. The only thing that is iffy is the phone grip, it does not open very wide and it is shallow. It holds my smaller phone fine but it is too shallow to hold my daughters phone with her pop it handle on the back, it would only work if we took the case off. I got it to use on my phone so it is good for me and I finally get to be in pictures with my family.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Selfie stick mode is good
reviews.reviewText: Selfie stick version is good but sometimes the device doesn’t stand firmly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good tripod for the money
reviews.reviewText: I wanted an entry level tripod/selfie stick to help with my Instagram reels. This does the trick. It fits my Pixel 6 just fine. Be aware the remote control is for pictures only. You can't use to start/stop a video.It is light-duty so it can be a bit unstable if you have your phone angled down. I've had to position some braces along the legs to keep it in place.Overall, it works just fine for what you pay for it. I have no complaints

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price!
reviews.reviewText: Better than expected for the price! Connects easily and reconnects quickly when you turn it back on. I like that it is compact when collapsed. It is a little wobbly if you are trying to use it as a tripod and have it fully extended, especially in windy environments, but this is to be expected. Overall very happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works. Instructions aren't clear. Wouldn't give to those who tend to need help understanding phones
reviews.reviewText: Mainly, the instructions are not clear. You heavily rely on the pictures and play around with the different parts. Once you figure it out, it's fairly easy to use. If this is a gift for someone less tech savvy, you may need to set it up for them .The stand isn't the most stable at every angle, but it's usable and what I'd expect for the price I paid.It is a pain (literally) getting the foot to open, though. They show it's able to me pushed open with your finger, but it hurt a bit to do that on mine and I don't have fingernails. A pen does the trick for opening it, though.Also, it does mess with functions on my phone when Bluetooth is connected to the stick. E.g. my messages app wouldn't allow me to use my keyboard. Took me a few minutes to figure out it was the Bluetooth connection to the selfie stick that interfered with it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It does what it says it does
reviews.reviewText: I wasn’t expecting much at this price point. When it was delivered, I opened the carton and was concerned that it was so light. When I opened it, I was glad to see that the expandable tubing was beefier than I feared. It holds the phone safely. It extends nice and tight. The light is ok and a nice add compared to others that do not include one. The three legs open a bit hard. I sometimes feel as though I was going to break them. It also can easily fall over with the weight of the phone so just make sure to support it while adjusting phone angle. Overall it is a great item, especially at this cost.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value AND great quality
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical but figured for the price it was worth the chance. I was pleasantly surprised - it is sturdy, connected immediately and is so light and compact. It even came with a replacement battery. My only issue is that I have a very thick battery pack on my iPhone and it extends a little beyond the holding clips - No problem that a small black hair band (Dollar Tree item - about a dozen of them for $1.25) attached and wrapped up to secure the camera didn't solve. When folded up and not in use the hair band provides a way for me to secure it to a beltloop with a carabiner. I went back and bought 5 more for sharing with family and friends because I know there will be a lot of FOMO once I use it in front of them!
Goed product op het eerste zicht. Niet super stevig, maar voor die prijs…

reviews.reviewTitle: Captura Momentos Perfectos con Elegancia: Palo Selfie Extensible con Luz LED y Trípode Reseña:
reviews.reviewText: Como entusiasta de la fotografía y los selfies, he encontrado en el Palo Selfie Extensible con Luz LED y Trípode la herramienta perfecta para elevar mis habilidades de captura de momentos. Este ingenioso dispositivo no solo es fácil de usar, sino que también agrega un toque profesional a mis fotografías gracias a su diseño versátil y funciones mejoradas.Lo primero que destaca de este palo selfie es su extensibilidad. Con una longitud extensible que alcanza hasta 80 cm, puedo capturar tomas amplias y grupales con facilidad. La posibilidad de ajustar la longitud según la situación me brinda la flexibilidad necesaria para obtener el encuadre perfecto, ya sea en una reunión familiar o durante mis viajes.La incorporación de una luz LED ajustable es una característica destacada. La iluminación es esencial para lograr selfies de calidad, y esta función eleva enormemente la calidad de mis fotos en condiciones de poca luz. La luz LED es lo suficientemente brillante como para proporcionar una iluminación uniforme y suave, evitando sombras indeseadas y resaltando los detalles en cada toma.El trípode desmontable es otro aspecto que ha mejorado significativamente mi experiencia fotográfica. No solo brinda estabilidad al palo selfie, sino que también me permite tomar fotos con manos libres. Esto es especialmente útil para capturar fotos grupales, videos o incluso transmisiones en vivo. La versatilidad del trípode ha ampliado las posibilidades de cómo y dónde puedo utilizar mi palo selfie.La conectividad Bluetooth es fácil de configurar y proporciona un control conveniente sobre la captura de fotos y videos. La compatibilidad con una variedad de dispositivos, incluyendo teléfonos inteligentes y cámaras compactas, hace que este palo selfie sea universalmente accesible.La durabilidad del material es notable. Aunque es liviano para facilitar su transporte, el palo selfie y el trípode están construidos con materiales de calidad que garantizan resistencia y estabilidad durante su uso prolongado.En resumen, el Palo Selfie Extensible con Luz LED y Trípode ha superado mis expectativas. Su diseño inteligente, funciones mejoradas y facilidad de uso lo convierten en un accesorio esencial para cualquier amante de la fotografía. Si buscas elevar tus habilidades fotográficas y capturar momentos con elegancia, este palo selfie es la elección perfecta. Recomiendo este producto sin dudarlo.
Wygodne w obsłudze, mocno trzyma telefon, jest OK.

Funktioniert sehr gut.nur beim ausgefahrenen Stativ sollte man es nicht auf die 3 Beine stellen, es wackelt sehr.Aber die Idee ist sehr gut, auch gut verarbeitet. Fernbedienung Funktioniert auch sehr gut.
